name: Last Breath (raidrDevs, Flip That Games)
description:
WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT

- About -

Last Breath is a rogue-like survival horror game set in suburban Australia, where six random individuals have been abducted by an experienced serial killer and held captive in a facility underneath his house. The objective of the game is to escape from the underground facility, through the basement and out of the house. You will have six chances to make one successful escape attempt to save the remaining victims. However, be mindful that your actions may inadvertently result in the death of some of the victims.

- Controls -

WASD - Movement

Left Ctrl - Crouch Left Shift - Sprint Mouse1 - Interact

- The Team -

Leo Laughlin - Project Lead, Level Design

Lachlan Phillips - AI Programmer, UI Design Lead Michael Moutafis - Lead Programmer Nathan Nilsen - Lead Audio,  Animation Chloe Millar - Animation, Concept Artist Zac D’Alo - Animation, Concept Artist Ben Agius - Music Composer Damon Laverick - Killer VA

- Social Media -

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RoomOfRedProdu1 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/room.of.red.productions/  Tik-Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@roomofredproductions

- PLAYTEST STAGE -

We are currently running an early-production playtest to receive feedback on certain game elements. The state of the game is subject to change significantly in the following six weeks. Currently, only the underground section is playable. We'd appreciate it if you could fill out the feedback form linked below.

**V0.1.1**

- Killer now respawns in the killing room after the victim's death - Disabled debug visuals FEEDBACK FORM: https://forms.gle/hWwhKBhCciEGMnqaA
